question: Which of the following is also known as Alauddin I?
option1: Abul Muzaffar Alauddin Hasan Bahman Shah
answer: Abul Muzaffar Alauddin Hasan Bahman Shah
explanation: In 1347 CE Zafar Khan Alai ascended the throne at Daulalabad as Abul Muzaffar Alauddin Hasan Bahman Shah-also known as Alauddin I. He founded the Bahmani Sultanate and played a conspicuous role in the politics of the Deccan for nearly two centuries.
